itemListElement.name: Ziti Cheddar Brussels Sprouts Bake Recipe

@graph.name: Ziti Cheddar Brussels Sprouts Bake Recipe
@graph.description: The shaved brussels in this pasta get caramelized with salt and pepper. The melty cheddar mixed in adds a great offset.
recipeIngredient: 6 oz pasta cooked according to instructions
1/2 cup white beans or 1/4 cup soaked cashews
1.5 to 2 cups almond milk or other non dairy milk
1 tsp garlic powder or garlic paste
3/4 cup follow your heart cheddar shreds ( or use my coconut milk cheddar or my Cauliflower Cheddar)
1 to 1.5 cups shredded/shaved Brussels sprouts (I used raw, you can also lightly steam them and use)
1/2 cup follow your heart cheddar shreds

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Ziti or Elbows or other smaller pasta al-dente, according to instructions. Add to a greased baking pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the Ziti or Elbows or other smaller pasta al-dente, according to instructions. Add to a greased baking pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the sauce: In a blender, add all the sauce ingredients. Blend, taste and adjust salt, spice. Add the sauce to the pasta and toss.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the sauce: In a blender, add all the sauce ingredients. Blend, taste and adjust salt, spice. Add the sauce to the pasta and toss.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the Brussels sprouts topping: Mix the salt, pepper, oil in the shredded brussels sprouts. Mix well by tossing and rubbing in. Mix in the cheddar.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the Brussels sprouts topping: Mix the salt, pepper, oil in the shredded brussels sprouts. Mix well by tossing and rubbing in. Mix in the cheddar.

recipeInstructions.text: Distribute the over the pasta. Spray oil on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Distribute the over the pasta. Spray oil on top.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at preheated 425 degrees F / 220ºc for 30-35 mins. For more crisper brussels sprouts. broil for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at preheated 425 degrees F / 220ºc for 30-35 mins. For more crisper brussels sprouts. broil for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: If not sure about Brussels Sprouts, sprinkle cheddar on the pasta and bake for 25 mins or until bubbly.
recipeInstructions.name: If not sure about Brussels Sprouts, sprinkle cheddar on the pasta and bake for 25 mins or until bubbly.
